original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 780: Zoneminder — Better Call Randal
original_content:
This week Jonathan Bennett and Aaron Newcomb chat with Isaac Connor about Zoneminder! Thats the project thats working to store and deliver all the bits from security cameras  but the CCTV world has changed a lot since Zoneminder first started, over 20 years ago. The project is working hard to keep up, with machine learning object detection, WebRTC, and more. Isaac talks a bit about developer burnout, and a case or two over the years where an aggressive contributor seems suspicious in retrospect. And when is the next stable version of Zoneminder coming out, anyway?


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right in the Hackaday Discord? Have someone youd like use to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Next week were taping the show on Tuesday, and looking for a guest!

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
